Reviews.Title: Security, everyone needs it.
Reviews.Author: DAVIS "Thinker"
Reviews.Content: Security is always important for everything.One lives better the more secure they feel, usually.I bought this to hook up some cameras around my house.From street walking thieves to people with nothing better to do.There's a whole mess of situations I wouldn't have been able to see until now.Now I see everything in night vision, if I wake up and hear a sound.I press my screen on and look, giving me instant gratification for being secure.I can watch all my cameras and see if any movement has been on them by motion detection.Pros:Very long, was not cheaply made.Cons: None so farOverall:I would recommend this to a friend and have.I believe everyone should have this kind of security.That way you don't have to go outside and find out what the noise is.Just turn your screen on and boom, you have the best view.

Reviews.Title: Video Quality is sub-par
Reviews.Author: Maverick
Reviews.Content: I ordered these cables to go along with a Swann system I installed at our small business.My first observation was that the cord is much thinner than the stock 65 ft cables provided with the kit I purchased. This may me because there is less shielding around the wires and that the wires are thinner in general.The video quality was very poor in my opinion. The picture was fuzzy and grainy compare to the stock cables. Maybe you won't notice on a 400 TVL resolution system, but for our 660 TVL system, it looked pathetic. So much so that I returned two of the three cables I purchased. I only kept the one I opened since I took it out of the package. It is installed currently and there is a CLEAR DIFFERENCE in the quality.I would NOT recommend this to anyone, even for the low price. It would be better as jump rope.

Reviews.Title: Good Long Security Cable - Recommended
Reviews.Author: C. Hill "CFH"
Reviews.Content: This VideoSecu 150' cable works well with the cameras that came with my Zmodo Surveillance System with 8 Weatherproof IR Cameras PKD-DK0865-NHD and is generally good overall quality. The cable is thinner than the other cables that came with my system, but that has not seemed to effect the performance. This is a long cable and care does need to be taken to fully unwind the bundle before running the cable to avoid tangles.Works for my needs, recommended!CFH

Reviews.Title: Easy to untangle if you know how they are wound together.
Reviews.Author: Forever and Always "Anticipating better"
Reviews.Content: These work.  We bought 2 of the 150' power/video/audio lines.  The power is the black connector on these, while video is yellow, and the red ones are audio.  Really cannot see a difference in video quality between the 60' and the 150' on my monitor.  We are using 5 of the 60' ones that came with the DVR and cameras; 2@150' (with audio), and a 100' one without audio connectors.  All the cameras, pigtails, connections, and audio video power cords tested well, and are still working after 2 weeks.The video/power cords must be hooked up while they are still on a machine, which has the middle of the lines held while the end connectors are being installed.  While the line is still being held by its middle, the two ends are rolled, then strapped together.  To unwind with the least problems, it is best to unroll and straighten with ALL of the connectors at the same end and the other end being the middle of the lines.  Then untwist the lines and straighten them out.  My husband showed me how and we had all 8 of the lines stretched out in around 45 minutes.  It is cool to note that the company has audio microphones that you can attached to the lines with audio connectors AND the DVR has audio inputs as well.  Haven't used them yet.  Will re-post if I ever do, to let anyone know if they record audio.  Figure I might want to invest the $12-15 to get audio if it will help me recognize a vandal.Since all of the video quality is good, but not like what they show on any TV programs or those used for giving you a ticket, I have no problems with the quality of the reception.  In other words, the quality is good, but will not allow you to read license plates or get a definite ID unless you are quite lucky.  But you will be able to tell species, quantities of those surveyed, general clothes, general stature, model of car, and that type of thing in the dark.  During the day the video is even better, with facial recognition possible.

Reviews.Title: Great Price for the product
Reviews.Author: E. Parsons
Reviews.Content: be careful unraveling a 100ft cable. Go slowly or you will have a tangled mess.... I found that out the hard way. Great price for the quantity of cable.

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy!
Reviews.Author: David J. Kermode
Reviews.Content: Great quality at a very low price.  The black color is much better than the white color on the cables supplied in my Q-see video system.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Eddie F Bryant
Reviews.Content: Good quality cable with no noticeable electrical interference from the AC home wiring. Does what it's supposed to do, and the price is right.

Reviews.Title: good cables
Reviews.Author: christopher
Reviews.Content: Even tough it was 150 ft worked fine with the video resolution. The signal interference or cut outs in between

Reviews.Title: worked well
Reviews.Author: T. Lewis
Reviews.Content: I purchases these with our new Swann security system.  We needed the extra length for our home.  These were packed nicely and on a wire wrap holder so they were pretty easy to unwind without being a knotted mess.

Reviews.Title: Very nice cable with audio
Reviews.Author: snackdaddy
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice cable because it has the line for audio already built in the cable. The 150ft will go across most average sized homes.Nice price too with free shipping

Reviews.Title: Good Buy, Great Price!!
Reviews.Author: CRICKET
Reviews.Content: I work for a business that needed Security Cameras in the parking lot. Unfortunately the 60 foot cables that came with the new Security Cameras were to short. The 150 feet VideoSecu Audio Video cables worked great, and the price was right. Amazon came to the rescue again.

Reviews.Title: Functional and Cost effective
Reviews.Author: Brian Johnson
Reviews.Content: I purchased these cables for my Zmodo camera system.  I have a 1,300 sq/ft home and just needed a few extra feet on a few of the runs and these cables have worked perfectly.Pros: No visible loss in quality when running over the increased distance but I do only have basic cameras.  You may be able to notice a quality difference on 600TVL cameras but then again if you had those you would probably have enough cash to spring for high quality cables.Included audio cable! I was very happy to get an included audio jack on the cables in case one day I wanted to upgrade my cameras I would nto have to replace the cabling.Cons: I may be a little at fault here but the cable wrapping is atrocious.  I tried to figure out a way to do it best but unraveling the cables was a real pain.  They folded the cable in half and then wounded it up in a coil.  It took an additional 30 mins to unravel the cable and then re-coil it for install.

Reviews.Title: resolution suffers compared to the 60' cable
Reviews.Author: avidshopper
Reviews.Content: I purchased the 150' cable to use with my security system.  The system came with 60' cables, and I wanted to have a farther run.  The quality is shockingly different (not in a good way) the picture is much fuzzier with significantly less clarity.  It gets the job done, but I would not purchase another due to the quality of the video suffering so.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed.
Reviews.Author: JP
Reviews.Content: These cable are work perfect for my application. I've got a super long hallway and needed to mount security cameras with audio. These are perfect. The cable is thin, but they work well. No noise or distortion. Also 150ft of thinner cable is easier to work with as opposed to thick ones. Only 2 things I didn't like was the fact that I need to completely un-roll the cable then re-roll it to make my runs because of the way it was packaged and the connector ends have very short leads meaning the connections on the DVR need to be close together. These were not problems, just personal preferences. I would still recommend these cable because they do work well.

Reviews.Title: Take your time to unwind the cord
Reviews.Author: J. Phillips
Reviews.Content: As other reviewers have said, this cable is a little thinner than the cables supplied with my security system, but they seem to work fine.I bought several of these because the cable that came with the security system was too short. The biggest problem I had was tangled cord.  They folded the cord in half, then wound it up as a pair of wires starting at the point of the fold.  With the first cable, I just undid the ties holding the wire in the loop, and kind of tossed the roll to unroll it.  That was a huge mistake - it took about 1/2 hour to untangle the mess.  On the second cable I took a couple of minutes and unrolled it very carefully, then rolled it back into a spool starting at one end of the cable.  It saved a lot of time and prevented the cable from ending up in a big tangle.

Reviews.Title: Good video cable
Reviews.Author: rdlidke
Reviews.Content: Cable worked better than expected. Although the cabling is very thin, it was very reliable. I had it stretched acrossed a field when a jeep & an ATV ran over it & it still worked great. You will need to completely unwind & rewind when you first get the cable as it is wound from both ends & knots easily when you first try to unravel it. Would recommand a cable reel to put it on for future use.

Reviews.Title: cable
Reviews.Author: protech
Reviews.Content: I was kind of disappointed the cable is thin I was hoping that the cable would be a little thicker and or stronger

Reviews.Title: Exactly What I Ordered.
Reviews.Author: Clyde O. Stephens ""Old Fart Ex Tex""
Reviews.Content: This is a very inexpensive source of bulk cable for me. The cable  is rugged and easy to solder. I have some 30 to 50 foot runs that have been in rough service for months with zero failures.

Reviews.Title: Awesomeness
Reviews.Author: Tommy Highfinder
Reviews.Content: This is a great product! Works great and does the job I need it to do! It's cheap, and it does what it's supposed to do. I plug in my camera and then hooked up to my computer. Then it is donw. A perfect cable, and it is low profile. I had a Q-see cable that was white and hated that it stuck out like a sore thumb. Great product.Highly recommeded!

Reviews.Title: Excellent cables
Reviews.Author: Chris C
Reviews.Content: These are excellent cables, works great, at a fraction of the cost you would pay at a local electonics store like Best Buy.

Reviews.Title: Very long cable
Reviews.Author: Portland Ghosts
Reviews.Content: I purchased this cable because I already have two 100' cables for my CCTV/DVR paranormal investigation setup and wanted a longer cable just in case. Like the other VideoSecu 100' cables I have, this works very well. Also as with the other 100' cables, it is very thin and I recommend being very careful with it. Keep it away from sharp edges and be careful when rolling up and retrieving the cable. It doesn't appear that it would take much to damage these cables.Be gentle with them and they should serve you well.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: George M.
Reviews.Content: I have several of these in use today and I get good quality video even at this long distance. I will do business with VideoSecu again!

Reviews.Title: Cable broke AFTER installing around entire house... UGH
Reviews.Author: John W. Mason-Smith
Reviews.Content: The center pin for the yellow connector broke.... AFTER I wired the entire cable around my house. Radio shack had a new connector that I could splice on, but it was still a pain in the butt and the connection is sketchy now. I don't recommend this cable, but if you get it be very careful when plugging it in for the first time.

Reviews.Title: BUYER BEWARE:  poor product quality,horrible return policy
Reviews.Author: shaun
Reviews.Content: this cable already went bad.  installed shortly after i bought it, and it quit working on 11/7.  i cant return it???  warranty is only a month?  i will be making my decisions on amazon products MUCH closer now that i know their return policy is less than 30 days.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Jai
Reviews.Content: Works fine to me. I gets the job done. Not much to say about this. You get what you see.

Reviews.Title: long way to go.
Reviews.Author: victim
Reviews.Content: i bought this twice b/4 . this is a reorder. the reason why i ordered it is because the tree i wrapped it around grew until it covered the wire , and when i tried to pull it free, i yanked it too hard and the wire broke. does this give you an idea how long it lasts outdoors?

Reviews.Title: Worked Great!
Reviews.Author: Dixiepartsman
Reviews.Content: No problems. I ran 2 of these across my attic from one end of the house to the other and they work well.

Reviews.Title: very disapointed
Reviews.Author: kelly
Reviews.Content: this is the 5th time i have sent a request to get this fixed  with no responce i bought 8 150 ft audio video powe wire security camera cables.  one of the cables didn't work. this is the first time i have used amazon to order anything. i thought that they would make it up to me but i guess not. the other 7 work just fine. i have other houses that i plan on puting cameras in but i will not use this vender again. the product is worth it. just not on the back end. kelly. it has now been over 3 weeks and still no responce. this place is a rip off.not one person has contacted me

Reviews.Title: Perfect for DIY build
Reviews.Author: James DeMichael
Reviews.Content: These work great for DIY security builds if you plan on adding mics. The price was outstanding as well. I suggest to all to PLAN your builds. Work it out on paper before you start. You'll be sorry if you're in the middle of an install and a needed piece is not there.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Kozy Dude
Reviews.Content: Just a roll of cables do what it is suppose to and is what they say it is, came on time and works well.

Reviews.Title: recommend !
Reviews.Author: Ted
Reviews.Content: all things considered. Great product. Love the use of it. I am hoping any one that buys this will feel the same as myself. No issues.

Reviews.Title: nedded extra length
Reviews.Author: brinkley
Reviews.Content: I ordered this cable for another long cable run, original 60' cable was much too short,This worked just fine.

Reviews.Title: Worked exactly as intended
Reviews.Author: LowTek
Reviews.Content: I was uncertain if the 150ft cable would be too much and was worried about noise on such a long run.  No problem.  Worked perfectly and the video was unchanged.  Would purchase again.

Reviews.Title: Needed for security system
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Working flawlessly at the moment. Our local business owner we helped buy them for is very thankful. Seems to be pretty good quality.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: HANK101
Reviews.Content: good product, no problems, sturdy and works, just what i needed, i would recomend it to anyone, thanks alot, hank

Reviews.Title: worked as it is supposed too.
Reviews.Author: Robert S Givens
Reviews.Content: the cable is doing what it is designed to do. did not use the BNC to RCA adaptors, not needed for my purpose.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as expected
Reviews.Author: So cal survival 2012 +
Reviews.Content: Came very fast, good quality for price. Now can see my driveway at night. Caught a "rod" flying by house in IR. If you never heard of a rod check out documentary on them on any video streaming website. Not only with cameras can you see things going on around your house... you can intimidate would be criminals AND prob catch some anomalies of the "paranormal" sort one day if your paying attention.

Reviews.Title: ARRIVED VERY LATE
Reviews.Author: rick land
Reviews.Content: SHIPPING PROBLEMS.COST ME TOO MUCH TO FINISH HOOKING THE CAMERA UP HAD TO GO ELSEWHERE TO PURCHASE WIRE (WAY TO MUCH)!!WENT AHEAD AND BOUGHT ITMIGHT INSTALL ANOTHER CAMERA LATER

Reviews.Title: It works.
Reviews.Author: Norman F.
Reviews.Content: Connected it to my CCTV camera, DVR and power supply and it worked as expected, good image with Sony Exview CCD. I am not using audio yet, very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: It is a cable
Reviews.Author: Jackie R Conner "yogidoodle"
Reviews.Content: It was a cable. Hard to mess that up. I think it was only 149.8 feet long. I could be wrong

Reviews.Title: cable
Reviews.Author: Steve Henry
Reviews.Content: Its a piece of cable that has ends on it same as what I needed. So its great. thank you

Reviews.Title: More Than Needed
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: This cable length is long enough! Only problem is that it gets tangled up real fast once you take it out of the box! But other then that, it works fine with my Zmodo DVR system and cameras. even outside in the rain or hot summer heat. Still haven't had any problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Ruso Minnifield "PrinceHappy2"
Reviews.Content: This extra length allows me to use one cable instead of putting two together to get to a longer distance.  The price was good for the product.

Reviews.Title: Good product!!!
Reviews.Author: Omar Torres
Reviews.Content: Real simple to install by my self and works really good .I'm very happy!!I liked the fact that I arrived on time.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu
Reviews.Author: Theodore T.
Reviews.Content: I like it.Now I need something that will amplify the video/audio output to input.Can you help me?Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Very good cable without any issues.
Reviews.Author: Bryce
Reviews.Content: I have over 50 cameras in 3 different systems/homes and after trying a bunch of different cables, have found these to be the strongest, most reliable for the money. I love them and will continue using them on ALL installations.

Reviews.Title: Excellent.
Reviews.Author: J. CHITKARA "JC"
Reviews.Content: Installed and it recently  to add more cameras at my place.Works perfectly. No crimping, no hassles. Perfectly cut and tightly machine crimped.So no issues.Will work good for anyone who knows the length. Always calculate a little extra,

Reviews.Title: videosecu cable
Reviews.Author: ribbons
Reviews.Content: This was not as heavy as what I would have liked but much better than the cable sold with the camera I had purchased

Reviews.Title: Security Cables
Reviews.Author: Gary Cobb
Reviews.Content: The cable have not yet been installed. As soon as we install them, I will write a more accuate review. Thank you, Gary Cobb ~

Reviews.Title: Good quality for the price
Reviews.Author: Louis Gedo
Reviews.Content: It's not a high end AV cable but for the average camera installation, this is fine. The cable that costs 4 times more will not give you even twice the video quality.

Reviews.Title: More than enough cord
Reviews.Author: A. Belcher "Shelly"
Reviews.Content: Was more than enough cord that we needed but better to have more than not enough, even though we did not use this cord.

Reviews.Title: So far, SO good
Reviews.Author: Madashell
Reviews.Content: Wanted to hear what was in our shop building from the house security system. Very clear, no lines, no signal issues. Sound is VERY good and the connectors fit very tight. We bought, and will buy many more.

Reviews.Title: Great for those long runs
Reviews.Author: Blindman "b man"
Reviews.Content: These along with several other electronic adapter products helped complete a security camera surveilance system.  They worked flawlessly.  Great product, highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Big Perk
Reviews.Content: Good deal on some long cable. Additional adapters were handy to have and made installation easier. Item shipped fast. They are decent cables for decent money.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money... Especially compared to local retail prices.
Reviews.Author: Woodlandsman "Woodlandsman"
Reviews.Content: More and more, I use these as "throw down" cables to test things. Less and less do I use them for installations because the huge connectors on the end, etc. tend to hang up on everything in walls and attics.

Reviews.Title: MORE THAN EXPECTED
Reviews.Author: JEREMY MCCELLON
Reviews.Content: VIDEO SECU DID ALL THAT WAS PROMISED AND DID IT FASTER THAN WAS EVEN EXPECTED. I WOULD RECOMEND THEM TO EVERYONE  LOOKING FOR SURVEILANCE EQUIPMENT OR ACCESORIES.

Reviews.Title: very good product
Reviews.Author: Ronald Kinner
Reviews.Content: This length was just right for our church camera.works very well with the camera we orderedShipped on time.

Reviews.Title: videosecu 150 feet audio video power security cable with bnc
Reviews.Author: LouieD
Reviews.Content: good quality and product is exactly as described and very easy to set up and arrived quickly and properly packed

Reviews.Title: returns
Reviews.Author: nestor ortiz
Reviews.Content: make sure you don,t order this unless u know u need it forsure or they will subtact7 or 8$ to return the product. you don,t need extra wireing

Reviews.Title: Best cable worth buying
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: Well since I do Paranormal studies and use CCTV Camera units, I have to buy these cords, I am happy with these cables and plan to buy many more and in different sizes.

ProductInfo.Features:
150 feet all-in-one audio video and power cable for CCTV security camera
Transmit audio video signals and supply DC power for CCTV security cameras
Be made of pure copper and of good quality
BNC video, RCA audio & 2.1mm power connectors
Plug and play ready, easy to install
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 150ft Feet Audio Video Power Wire Security Camera Cable with BNC RCA Adaptor ACBVA150 3JH
